roleset.name: trespass

example.name: gross example
example.text: I was a last-minute ([*] read interloping) attendee at a French journalism convention and so far the festivities had been taken up entirely by eating, drinking, smoking, sleeping and drinking.

roleset.note: INTERLOPE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'interlope' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from interlope.01-v predicate notes)
